org.gearvrf

Class GVRPhongShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gearvrf.GVRShaderTemplate
      • org.gearvrf.GVRPhongShader

  • public class GVRPhongShader
extends GVRShaderTemplate
    Manages a set of variants on vertex and fragment shaders from the same source code.

    • Method Detail

      • getRenderDefines

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getRenderDefines(GVRRenderData rdata,
                                                                              GVRScene scene)
        Description copied from class: GVRShaderTemplate
        Generate shader-specific defines from the rendering information. You can override this function in your shader class to change which variant is generated depending on the GVRRenderData settings. The base implementation LIGHTSOURCES as 0 if lighting is not enabled by the render data, and it defines SHADOWS as 1 if any light source enables shadow casting.
        Overrides:
        getRenderDefines in class GVRShaderTemplate
        Parameters:
        rdata - GVRRenderData being used by this shader
        scene - scene being rendered
        Returns:
        list of symbols to be defined (value 1) or undefined (value 0) in the shader
        See Also:
        setCastShadow
